description.zh-cn: 美国经济学家，芝加哥大学经济学教授，第二代芝加哥经济学派领军人物，以研究宏观经济学、微观经济学、经济史、统计学及主张自由放任资本主义而闻名。他是1976年诺贝尔经济学奖得主。
description.en: American economist and professor at the University of Chicago, a leading figure of the second generation of the Chicago school of economics. He was known for his research on macroeconomics, microeconomics, economic history, statistics, and his advocacy of laissez-faire capitalism. He was a recipient of the 1976 Nobel Memorial Prize in Economic Sciences.

description.zh-cn: 美国经济学家，米尔顿·佛利民的妻子和长期合作者。
description.en: American economist, wife and longtime collaborator of Milton Friedman.

description.zh-cn: 美国经济学家、法学学者、物理学家及作家，圣塔克拉拉大学法学院教授，无政府资本主义理论的重要学者，米尔顿·佛利民的儿子。
description.en: American economist, legal scholar, physicist, and author, a professor of law at Santa Clara University. He is a major figure in the theory of anarcho-capitalism and the son of Milton Friedman.

description.zh-cn: 位于美国伊利诺伊州芝加哥的私立研究型大学。
description.en: A private research university in Chicago, Illinois.

description.zh-cn: 位于美国纽约市曼哈顿的世界顶级私立研究型大学。
description.en: A private Ivy League research university in New York City.

description.zh-cn: 位于美国新泽西州的公立研究型大学。
description.en: A public research university in New Jersey.

description.zh-cn: 俄裔美国经济学家、统计学家，1971年诺贝尔经济学奖得主。
description.en: A Russian-American economist, statistician, and Nobel laureate in Economic Sciences in 1971.

description.zh-cn: 美国经济学家，1992年诺贝尔经济学奖得主，芝加哥经济学派的代表人物之一。
description.en: American economist who received the 1992 Nobel Memorial Prize in Economic Sciences. He was a leader of the Chicago School of economics.

description.zh-cn: 奥地利裔英国经济学家、政治哲学家，1974年诺贝尔经济学奖得主，以坚持自由市场资本主义和批评社会主义而闻名。
description.en: An Austrian and British economist and political philosopher who received the 1974 Nobel Memorial Prize in Economic Sciences. He is known for his defense of classical liberalism.

description.zh-cn: 英国经济学家，其思想奠定了宏观经济学的基础，并促成了凯恩斯主义经济学的产生。
description.en: An English economist, whose ideas fundamentally changed the theory and practice of macroeconomics and the economic policies of governments, leading to Keynesian economics.

description.zh-cn: 英国政治家，1979年至1990年任英国首相。
description.en: A British stateswoman who served as Prime Minister of the United Kingdom from 1979 to 1990.

description.zh-cn: 智利将军和独裁者，于1973年发动军事政变推翻阿连德政府后，统治智利至1990年。
description.en: A Chilean general and dictator who ruled Chile from 1973 to 1990, after leading a military coup to overthrow the government of Salvador Allende.

description.zh-cn: 美国政治家，1981年至1989年任第40任美国总统。
description.en: An American politician who served as the 40th president of the United States from 1981 to 1989.

description.zh-cn: 美国经济学家，曾任职于国家经济研究局，与米尔顿·佛利民合著了《美国货币史》。
description.en: An American economist who worked at the National Bureau of Economic Research and co-authored 'A Monetary History of the United States' with Milton Friedman.

description.zh-cn: 一个经济学学派，强调自由市场和货币主义的重要性，与芝加哥大学经济系密切相关。
description.en: A school of economic thought that emphasizes the importance of free markets and monetarism, closely associated with the Department of Economics at the University of Chicago.

description.zh-cn: 一种经济学理论，强调货币供给是经济活动中的主要决定因素。
description.en: A school of thought in monetary economics that emphasizes the role of governments in controlling the amount of money in circulation.

en: A Monetary History of the United States, 1867-1960

description.zh-cn: 由米尔顿·佛利民和安娜·施瓦茨合著的经济学著作，书中挑战了凯恩斯学派的观点。
description.en: A book by Milton Friedman and Anna Schwartz that challenges Keynesian views on the economy.

description.zh-cn: 基于约翰·梅纳德·凯恩斯思想的宏观经济学理论，主张政府通过财政政策积极干预经济。
description.en: A school of macroeconomic thought based on the ideas of John Maynard Keynes, advocating for active government intervention through fiscal policy.

description.zh-cn: 1929年始于美国的严重全球性经济衰退。
description.en: A severe worldwide economic depression that took place mostly during the 1930s, beginning in the United States.

description.zh-cn: 美国的中央银行系统。
description.en: The central banking system of the United States.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国前主要领导人之一，曾任国务院总理和中共中央总书记。
description.en: A former high-ranking leader in the People's Republic of China, who served as Premier of the State Council and General Secretary of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国前主要领导人之一，曾任国务院总理。
description.en: A former high-ranking leader in the People's Republic of China, who served as Premier of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 位于斯坦福大学的美国公共政策智库。
description.en: An American public policy think tank located at Stanford University.

en: United States Department of the Treasury

description.zh-cn: 美国的联邦行政部门，负责管理联邦政府的财政事务。
description.en: The national treasury of the federal government of the United States.

description.zh-cn: 由米尔顿·佛利民和罗斯·佛利民合著的书籍及主持的电视节目，旨在向大众普及自由市场经济原理。
description.en: A book and television series by Milton and Rose Friedman that advocates for free market principles.

description.zh-cn: 爱沙尼亚政治家，曾两次担任爱沙尼亚总理。
description.en: An Estonian politician who served as the Prime Minister of Estonia twice.

description.zh-cn: 米尔顿·佛利民于1933年在芝加哥大学与罗斯相识，六年后结婚，两人是终身的伴侣和学术合作者。
description.en: Milton Friedman met Rose at the University of Chicago in 1933, they married six years later and were lifelong partners and academic collaborators.

description.zh-cn: 大卫·佛利民是米尔顿·佛利民的儿子。
description.en: David Friedman is the son of Milton Friedman.

description.zh-cn: 1932年，米尔顿·佛利民从罗格斯大学获得文学士学位。
description.en: In 1932, Milton Friedman received his Bachelor of Arts degree from Rutgers University.

description.zh-cn: 1933年，米尔顿·佛利民从芝加哥大学获得硕士学位。
description.en: In 1933, Milton Friedman received his Master of Arts degree from the University of Chicago.

description.zh-cn: 1946年，米尔顿·佛利民从哥伦比亚大学获得博士学位。
description.en: In 1946, Milton Friedman received his Ph.D. from Columbia University.

description.zh-cn: 米尔顿·佛利民在芝加哥大学担任经济学教授长达30年，期间将该校经济系形塑成著名的芝加哥经济学派。
description.en: Milton Friedman served as a professor of economics at the University of Chicago for 30 years, during which he shaped its economics department into the renowned Chicago School of economics.

description.zh-cn: 从1977年开始，米尔顿·佛利民加入了斯坦福大学的胡佛研究所。
description.en: Beginning in 1977, Milton Friedman joined the Hoover Institution at Stanford University.

description.zh-cn: 西蒙·史密斯·库兹涅茨是米尔顿·佛利民在哥伦比亚大学的博士生导师。
description.en: Simon Smith Kuznets was Milton Friedman's doctoral advisor at Columbia University.

description.zh-cn: 加里·贝克是米尔顿·佛利民的博士生。
description.en: Gary Becker was a doctoral student of Milton Friedman.

description.zh-cn: 弗里德里希·海耶克是影响米尔顿·佛利民思想的重要人物之一，两人共同促使了20世纪古典自由主义的复苏。
description.en: Friedrich Hayek was one of the key figures who influenced Milton Friedman's thinking, and together they were major figures in the revival of classical liberalism in the 20th century.

description.zh-cn: 米尔顿·佛利民是凯恩斯主义经济学的著名批评者，他的货币主义理论直接挑战了凯恩斯学派的观点。
description.en: Milton Friedman was a prominent critic of Keynesian economics, and his monetarist theories directly challenged the views of the Keynesian school.

description.zh-cn: 米尔顿·佛利民的经济理论对英国首相柴契尔夫人的经济政策产生了极大影响。
description.en: Milton Friedman's economic theories had a significant influence on the economic policies of British Prime Minister Margaret Thatcher.

description.zh-cn: 米尔顿·佛利民的理论对1980年代开始治理美国的罗纳德·里根的经济及货币政策有极大影响。
description.en: Milton Friedman's theories had a major influence on the economic and monetary policies of Ronald Reagan, who governed the United States starting in the 1980s.

description.zh-cn: 1981年，米尔顿·佛利民担任罗纳德·里根总统的经济政策顾问。
description.en: In 1981, Milton Friedman served as an economic policy advisor to President Ronald Reagan.

description.zh-cn: 米尔顿·佛利民的经济思想，通过被称为“芝加哥男孩”的学生们，深刻影响了奥古斯图·皮诺契特治下智利的经济改革。
description.en: Milton Friedman's economic ideas, through his students known as the 'Chicago Boys', profoundly influenced the economic reforms in Chile under Augusto Pinochet.

description.zh-cn: 米尔顿·佛利民是货币主义的主要提倡者，他现代化了货币数量理论，并将其推广为现代经济学的主流货币学说。
description.en: Milton Friedman was the main proponent of monetarism, modernizing the quantity theory of money and promoting it into a mainstream monetary doctrine in modern economics.

description.zh-cn: 米尔顿·佛利民与安娜·施瓦茨合著了《美国货币史》，该书是货币主义学派的代表作之一。
description.en: Milton Friedman co-authored 'A Monetary History of the United States' with Anna Schwartz, which is one of the seminal works of the monetarist school.

description.zh-cn: 安娜·施瓦茨与米尔顿·佛利民合著了《美国货币史》。
description.en: Anna Schwartz co-authored 'A Monetary History of the United States' with Milton Friedman.

description.zh-cn: 《美国货币史》一书通过其研究挑战了凯恩斯学派关于货币供应在经济周期中作用的观点。
description.en: The book 'A Monetary History of the United States' challenged the Keynesian school's views on the role of money supply in the business cycle through its research.

description.zh-cn: 根据米尔顿·佛利民的观点，联邦储备银行的政策和管理失误，特别是错误的紧缩货币供给，是导致经济大萧条的主要原因。
description.en: According to Milton Friedman, the policy and management failures of the Federal Reserve, especially the misguided contraction of the money supply, were the main cause of the Great Depression.

description.zh-cn: 1988年9月19日，米尔顿·佛利民在北京中南海获时任中共中央总书记赵紫阳接见，双方就中国经济改革等问题进行了两个小时的会谈。
description.en: On September 19, 1988, Milton Friedman was received by then-General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee Zhao Ziyang at Zhongnanhai in Beijing, where they had a two-hour discussion on China's economic reforms.

description.zh-cn: 据张五常认为，中国前总理朱镕基后来制订的中国货币制度深受佛利民学说影响。
description.en: According to Steven N. S. Cheung, the monetary system later established by former Chinese Premier Zhu Rongji was deeply influenced by Friedman's theories.

description.zh-cn: 1941年至1943年，佛利民出任美国财政部顾问，研究战时税务政策。
description.en: From 1941 to 1943, Friedman served as an advisor to the U.S. Department of the Treasury, researching wartime tax policy.

description.zh-cn: 米尔顿·佛利民的《选择的自由》一书对后来成为爱沙尼亚总理的马尔特·拉尔产生了极大影响，是拉尔在任职总理前唯一读过的经济学书籍。
description.en: Milton Friedman's book 'Free to Choose' had a profound influence on Mart Laar, who later became Prime Minister of Estonia and claimed it was the only economics book he had read before taking office.
